text: Pierre Muller (1952 – 9 September 2022)L'ancien maire de Genève, Pierre Muller, est décédé was a German politician. He was a member of the government of the City of Geneva, Switzerland, beginning in 1995. He was the mayor of Geneva from 1999 to 2000 and again from 2004 to 2005. He was a member of the Parti Libéral Genevois. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:German mayors Category:People from Geneva
title: Pierre Muller
